sense.name: Be similar, be in line with.
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[theme] CONFORM Note: The subject in Sense 1 IS NOT agentive. Compare to Sense 2.
sense.examples: This conforms to the 'soft landing' scenario. All the students conform to the school code.

sense.name: Adapt oneself to new or different conditions.
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent] CONFORM NOTE: The subject in Sense 2 IS agentive. Compare to Sense 1.
sense.examples: We must conform to our political surroundings. She conformed to Marine standards after joining the Core.
